hooks.prompt:
When compacting, preserve:
- Your ROLE: ORCHESTRATOR (coordinates Task agents) or IMPLEMENTOR (executes TDD)
- Current working directory and whether you are in a worktree or main repo
- Architectural decisions made
- Unresolved bugs and blockers
- File paths and key function names
- Test results and failure messages

Discard:
- Redundant tool outputs
- Exploratory conversations
- Superseded plans
